I had to tighten the arms at the wrist and I'm going to have to take in either side of the blouse.  The quality of the blouse is acceptable however, and it washed all right but needed steaming after being washed to look presentable.  I took a chance on the blouse and to do it over again I think I would make a different choice.

Comfortable and cute. I originally bought this to use for a halloween costume, but it has since made its way into my normal closet.

I would have given 5 stars but I ordered a white blouse and this is slightly off white. That was fine in my case. That said, this is such a comfortable, feminine, luxurious blouse. I ordered a large is what I usually do so I can have a longer sleeve and wider shoulder. I sew so alterations are not a problem. I will not have to alter this because I don't want it super tight. I would definitely recommend purchasing this blouse.

评论概述: Lovely Blouse, but order a size up.
评论详情: This blouse is beautiful, but make sure to size up.  The fabric is more of a crepe feel and fairly sheer so a camisole would be in order if not wearing a vest or jacket.  I normally wear a large, and the extra-large is tight, including the sleeves.  The neck is also tight, but not too uncomfortable.  My reason for 4 stars vs 5 is all about the sizing.  The ruffles are great and perfect for the Victorian look I needed to accomplish.  The front ruffle is perfect above a waistcoat/vest, and the sleeve ruffles are perfectly long enough to extend past jacket sleeves for the desired look.  Overall, this is a great shirt and well worth the money if you can find the right size.

LOVE this blouse!! I’m a fan of ruffles that make a woman feel sexy instead of little-girl frilly. This blouse exceeded expectations! The fabric has substance and heft without being heavy or weighed down; it’s soft and drapes in all the right places. The collar can be worn buttoned up or open at the neck; the ruffles are distinct and the stitching on my shirt is quite good. I purchased the off-white blouse - the color is a great warm white, very versatile. I receive compliments every time I wear this blouse, which is one of the indicator I use to measure the success of a purchase. Between the quality for price, versatility/neutrality, and the “instant polish” this blouse offers (dress it up or down, it’s a staple basic!), you can’t go wrong. Buy it now.

评论概述: NOT OFF WHITE - Sheer/see-through material, soft and fits just right.
评论详情: THIS IS NOT OFF-WHITE LIKE ADVERTISED. IT'S SOLID WHITE AND SHEER FABRIC. My measurements: waist - 40 inches bust - 38 inches hips - 48 inches weight - 200 lbs  Bought an XXL - The blouse material is very soft but it's VERY sheer. You MUST wear something underneath. That is why I only gave 4/5 stars.  I'm 5'7" and it goes to the start of my thigh. I have a 38 inch bust - usually wear 40DD - and I had no problem buttoning or peek-a-boos with the chest closure. The collar stood up on it's own but I liked the extra support and touch of black with a choker. The cuffs fit me snug but comfortably. I wear it with a corset but from the images you'll be able to see the slack even with the corset.

评论概述: Great shirt! But inspect it upon receiving it.
评论详情: I love this shirt! I received lots of compliments on it. Fits perfectly. 😊  However, the reason for 4 stars is because, when I received the shirt there was evidence that it had been a previously worn and then returned. There were foundation stains on the collar and inner button hole seam of the shirt.  I did not realize it had stains until the night before the event I needed to wear the shirt (when I went to steam it). Fortunately, I had some Miss Mouth's Messy Eater spray and it brought the stains right out! I was very pleased it worked out.  Other minor defect I noticed was the inseam on the back of the shirt is uneven (bunched). I can live with that though and will be keeping the shirt.  Overall, it's a great shirt for the price. Just be sure to thoroughly check the shirt when you receive it! Don't wait until the night before you need to wear it like me. 😅  My measurements: B 36, W 30, H 37 Shirt size bought: M Usual US size: M/6-8
